00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief WISHBONE priority and round-robin SYSCON.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief bus_syscon.v
00030 */
00031 module bus_syscon(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input CLK_I,
00035     input reset_n,
00036     input halt_switch,
00037     //% @}
00038     
00039     //% \name Priority WISHBONE master interfaces

00040     //% @{
00041     input           masterP_cyc_o,
00042     input           masterP_stb_o,
00043     input           masterP_we_o,
00044     input   [31:2]  masterP_adr_o,
00045     input   [3:0]   masterP_sel_o,
00046     input   [31:0]  masterP_dat_o,
00047     output          masterP_ack_i,
00048     output          masterP_rty_i,
00049     output          masterP_err_i,
00050     //% @}
00051     
00052     //% \name Round-robin WISHBONE master interfaces

00053     //% @{
00054     input           masterR1_cyc_o,
00055     input           masterR1_stb_o,
00056     input           masterR1_we_o,
00057     input   [31:2]  masterR1_adr_o,
00058     input   [3:0]   masterR1_sel_o,
00059     input   [31:0]  masterR1_dat_o,
00060     output          masterR1_ack_i,
00061     output          masterR1_rty_i,
00062     output          masterR1_err_i,
00063     
00064     input           masterR2_cyc_o,
00065     input           masterR2_stb_o,
00066     input           masterR2_we_o,
00067     input   [31:2]  masterR2_adr_o,
00068     input   [3:0]   masterR2_sel_o,
00069     input   [31:0]  masterR2_dat_o,
00070     output          masterR2_ack_i,
00071     output          masterR2_rty_i,
00072     output          masterR2_err_i,
00073     
00074     input           masterR3_cyc_o,
00075     input           masterR3_stb_o,
00076     input           masterR3_we_o,
00077     input   [31:2]  masterR3_adr_o,
00078     input   [3:0]   masterR3_sel_o,
00079     input   [31:0]  masterR3_dat_o,
00080     output          masterR3_ack_i,
00081     output          masterR3_rty_i,
00082     output          masterR3_err_i,
00083     
00084     input           masterR4_cyc_o,
00085     input           masterR4_stb_o,
00086     input           masterR4_we_o,
00087     input   [31:2]  masterR4_adr_o,
00088     input   [3:0]   masterR4_sel_o,
00089     input   [31:0]  masterR4_dat_o,
00090     output          masterR4_ack_i,
00091     output          masterR4_rty_i,
00092     output          masterR4_err_i,
00093     
00094     input           masterR5_cyc_o,
00095     input           masterR5_stb_o,
00096     input           masterR5_we_o,
00097     input   [31:2]  masterR5_adr_o,
00098     input   [3:0]   masterR5_sel_o,
00099     input   [31:0]  masterR5_dat_o,
00100     output          masterR5_ack_i,
00101     output          masterR5_rty_i,
00102     output          masterR5_err_i,
00103     
00104     input           masterR6_cyc_o,
00105     input           masterR6_stb_o,
00106     input           masterR6_we_o,
00107     input   [31:2]  masterR6_adr_o,
00108     input   [3:0]   masterR6_sel_o,
00109     input   [31:0]  masterR6_dat_o,
00110     output          masterR6_ack_i,
00111     output          masterR6_rty_i,
00112     output          masterR6_err_i,
00113     
00114     input           masterR7_cyc_o,
00115     input           masterR7_stb_o,
00116     input           masterR7_we_o,
00117     input   [31:2]  masterR7_adr_o,
00118     input   [3:0]   masterR7_sel_o,
00119     input   [31:0]  masterR7_dat_o,
00120     output          masterR7_ack_i,
00121     output          masterR7_rty_i,
00122     output          masterR7_err_i,
00123     //% @}
00124     
00125     //% \name Common WISHBONE master signals

00126     //% @{
00127     output  [31:2]  master_adr_o,
00128     output          master_we_o,
00129     output  [3:0]   master_sel_o,
00130     output  [31:0]  master_dat_o,
00131     output  [31:0]  slave_dat_o,
00132     //% @}
00133     
00134     //% \name AND/OR master address mask signals

00135     //% @{
00136     output  [31:2]  master_adr_early_o,
00137     input   [31:2]  master_adr_and_mask,
00138     input   [31:2]  master_adr_or_mask,
00139     //% @}
00140     
00141     //% \name WISHBONE slave interfaces

00142     //% @{
00143     output          slave0_cyc_i,
00144     output          slave0_stb_i,
00145     input           slave0_ack_o,
00146     input           slave0_rty_o,
00147     input           slave0_err_o,
00148     input   [31:0]  slave0_dat_o,
00149     
00150     input           slave1_selected,
00151     output          slave1_cyc_i,
00152     output          slave1_stb_i,
00153     input           slave1_ack_o,
00154     input           slave1_rty_o,
00155     input           slave1_err_o,
00156     input   [31:0]  slave1_dat_o,
00157     
00158     input           slave2_selected,
00159     output          slave2_cyc_i,
00160     output          slave2_stb_i,
00161     input           slave2_ack_o,
00162     input           slave2_rty_o,
00163     input           slave2_err_o,
00164     input   [31:0]  slave2_dat_o,
00165     
00166     input           slave3_selected,
00167     output          slave3_cyc_i,
00168     output          slave3_stb_i,
00169     input           slave3_ack_o,
00170     input           slave3_rty_o,
00171     input           slave3_err_o,
00172     input   [31:0]  slave3_dat_o,
00173     
00174     input           slave4_selected,
00175     output          slave4_cyc_i,
00176     output          slave4_stb_i,
00177     input           slave4_ack_o,
00178     input           slave4_rty_o,
00179     input           slave4_err_o,
00180     input   [31:0]  slave4_dat_o,
00181     
00182     input           slave5_selected,
00183     output          slave5_cyc_i,
00184     output          slave5_stb_i,
00185     input           slave5_ack_o,
00186     input           slave5_rty_o,
00187     input           slave5_err_o,
00188     input   [31:0]  slave5_dat_o,
00189     
00190     input           slave6_selected,
00191     output          slave6_cyc_i,
00192     output          slave6_stb_i,
00193     input           slave6_ack_o,
00194     input           slave6_rty_o,
00195     input           slave6_err_o,
00196     input   [31:0]  slave6_dat_o,
00197     
00198     input           slave7_selected,
00199     output          slave7_cyc_i,
00200     output          slave7_stb_i,
00201     input           slave7_ack_o,
00202     input           slave7_rty_o,
00203     input           slave7_err_o,
00204     input   [31:0]  slave7_dat_o,
00205     
00206     input           slave8_selected,
00207     output          slave8_cyc_i,
00208     output          slave8_stb_i,
00209     input           slave8_ack_o,
00210     input           slave8_rty_o,
00211     input           slave8_err_o,
00212     input   [31:0]  slave8_dat_o,
00213     
00214     input           slave9_selected,
00215     output          slave9_cyc_i,
00216     output          slave9_stb_i,
00217     input           slave9_ack_o,
00218     input           slave9_rty_o,
00219     input           slave9_err_o,
00220     input   [31:0]  slave9_dat_o,
00221     
00222     input           slave10_selected,
00223     output          slave10_cyc_i,
00224     output          slave10_stb_i,
00225     input           slave10_ack_o,
00226     input           slave10_rty_o,
00227     input           slave10_err_o,
00228     input   [31:0]  slave10_dat_o,
00229     
00230     input           slave11_selected,
00231     output          slave11_cyc_i,
00232     output          slave11_stb_i,
00233     input           slave11_ack_o,
00234     input           slave11_rty_o,
00235     input           slave11_err_o,
00236     input   [31:0]  slave11_dat_o,
00237     
00238     input           slave12_selected,
00239     output          slave12_cyc_i,
00240     output          slave12_stb_i,
00241     input           slave12_ack_o,
00242     input           slave12_rty_o,
00243     input           slave12_err_o,
00244     input   [31:0]  slave12_dat_o,
00245     
00246     input           slave13_selected,
00247     output          slave13_cyc_i,
00248     output          slave13_stb_i,
00249     input           slave13_ack_o,
00250     input           slave13_rty_o,
00251     input           slave13_err_o,
00252     input   [31:0]  slave13_dat_o,
00253     
00254     input           slave14_selected,
00255     output          slave14_cyc_i,
00256     output          slave14_stb_i,
00257     input           slave14_ack_o,
00258     input           slave14_rty_o,
00259     input           slave14_err_o,
00260     input   [31:0]  slave14_dat_o,
00261     
00262     input           slave15_selected,
00263     output          slave15_cyc_i,
00264     output          slave15_stb_i,
00265     input           slave15_ack_o,
00266     input           slave15_rty_o,
00267     input           slave15_err_o,
00268     input   [31:0]  slave15_dat_o,
00269     
00270     //% \name Debug signals

00271     //% @{
00272     output [7:0]    debug_syscon
00273     //% @}
00274 );
00275 assign debug_syscon = { 3'b0, last_master_reg };
00276 
00277 assign master_adr_early_o =
00278     (last_master_reg == 5'd1)?  masterP_adr_o :
00279     (last_master_reg == 5'd2)?  masterR1_adr_o :
00280     (last_master_reg == 5'd3)?  masterR2_adr_o :
00281     (last_master_reg == 5'd4)?  masterR3_adr_o :
00282     (last_master_reg == 5'd5)?  masterR4_adr_o :
00283     (last_master_reg == 5'd6)?  masterR5_adr_o :
00284     (last_master_reg == 5'd7)?  masterR6_adr_o :
00285                                 masterR7_adr_o;
00286 
00287 assign master_adr_o = (master_adr_early_o & master_adr_and_mask) | master_adr_or_mask;
00288 
00289 assign master_we_o =
00290     (last_master_reg == 5'd1)?  masterP_we_o :
00291     (last_master_reg == 5'd2)?  masterR1_we_o :
00292     (last_master_reg == 5'd3)?  masterR2_we_o :
00293     (last_master_reg == 5'd4)?  masterR3_we_o :
00294     (last_master_reg == 5'd5)?  masterR4_we_o :
00295     (last_master_reg == 5'd6)?  masterR5_we_o :
00296     (last_master_reg == 5'd7)?  masterR6_we_o :
00297                                 masterR7_we_o;
00298 assign master_sel_o =
00299     (last_master_reg == 5'd1)?  masterP_sel_o :
00300     (last_master_reg == 5'd2)?  masterR1_sel_o :
00301     (last_master_reg == 5'd3)?  masterR2_sel_o :
00302     (last_master_reg == 5'd4)?  masterR3_sel_o :
00303     (last_master_reg == 5'd5)?  masterR4_sel_o :
00304     (last_master_reg == 5'd6)?  masterR5_sel_o :
00305     (last_master_reg == 5'd7)?  masterR6_sel_o :
00306                                 masterR7_sel_o;
00307 assign master_dat_o =
00308     (last_master_reg == 5'd1)?  masterP_dat_o :
00309     (last_master_reg == 5'd2)?  masterR1_dat_o :
00310     (last_master_reg == 5'd3)?  masterR2_dat_o :
00311     (last_master_reg == 5'd4)?  masterR3_dat_o :
00312     (last_master_reg == 5'd5)?  masterR4_dat_o :
00313     (last_master_reg == 5'd6)?  masterR5_dat_o :
00314     (last_master_reg == 5'd7)?  masterR6_dat_o :
00315                                 masterR7_dat_o;
00316 wire master_cyc_stb_o =
00317     (last_master_reg == 5'd1    && masterP_stb_o == 1'b1  && masterP_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00318     (last_master_reg == 5'd2    && masterR1_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR1_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00319     (last_master_reg == 5'd3    && masterR2_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR2_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00320     (last_master_reg == 5'd4    && masterR3_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR3_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00321     (last_master_reg == 5'd5    && masterR4_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR4_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00322     (last_master_reg == 5'd6    && masterR5_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR5_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00323     (last_master_reg == 5'd7    && masterR6_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR6_cyc_o == 1'b1) ||
00324     (last_master_reg == 5'd8    && masterR7_stb_o == 1'b1 && masterR7_cyc_o == 1'b1);
00325 
00326 assign masterP_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd1;
00327 assign masterP_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd1;
00328 assign masterP_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd1;
00329 
00330 assign masterR1_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd2;
00331 assign masterR1_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd2;
00332 assign masterR1_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd2;
00333 
00334 assign masterR2_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd3;
00335 assign masterR2_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd3;
00336 assign masterR2_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd3;
00337 
00338 assign masterR3_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd4;
00339 assign masterR3_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd4;
00340 assign masterR3_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd4;
00341 
00342 assign masterR4_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd5;
00343 assign masterR4_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd5;
00344 assign masterR4_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd5;
00345 
00346 assign masterR5_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd6;
00347 assign masterR5_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd6;
00348 assign masterR5_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd6;
00349 
00350 assign masterR6_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd7;
00351 assign masterR6_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd7;
00352 assign masterR6_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd7;
00353 
00354 assign masterR7_ack_i = master_ack_i && last_master_reg == 5'd8;
00355 assign masterR7_rty_i = master_rty_i && last_master_reg == 5'd8;
00356 assign masterR7_err_i = master_err_i && last_master_reg == 5'd8;
00357 
00358 wire slave0_selected = 
00359     slave1_selected == 1'b0 &&
00360     slave2_selected == 1'b0 &&
00361     slave3_selected == 1'b0 &&
00362     slave4_selected == 1'b0 &&
00363     slave5_selected == 1'b0 &&
00364     slave6_selected == 1'b0 &&
00365     slave7_selected == 1'b0 &&
00366     slave8_selected == 1'b0 &&
00367     slave9_selected == 1'b0 &&
00368     slave10_selected == 1'b0 &&
00369     slave11_selected == 1'b0 &&
00370     slave12_selected == 1'b0 &&
00371     slave13_selected == 1'b0 &&
00372     slave14_selected == 1'b0 &&
00373     slave15_selected == 1'b0;
00374 
00375 assign { slave0_cyc_i, slave0_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave0_selected == 1'b1)} };
00376 assign { slave1_cyc_i, slave1_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave1_selected == 1'b1)} };
00377 assign { slave2_cyc_i, slave2_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave2_selected == 1'b1)} };
00378 assign { slave3_cyc_i, slave3_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave3_selected == 1'b1)} };
00379 assign { slave4_cyc_i, slave4_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave4_selected == 1'b1)} };
00380 assign { slave5_cyc_i, slave5_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave5_selected == 1'b1)} };
00381 assign { slave6_cyc_i, slave6_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave6_selected == 1'b1)} };
00382 assign { slave7_cyc_i, slave7_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave7_selected == 1'b1)} };
00383 assign { slave8_cyc_i, slave8_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave8_selected == 1'b1)} };
00384 assign { slave9_cyc_i, slave9_stb_i }   = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave9_selected == 1'b1)} };
00385 assign { slave10_cyc_i, slave10_stb_i } = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave10_selected == 1'b1)} };
00386 assign { slave11_cyc_i, slave11_stb_i } = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave11_selected == 1'b1)} };
00387 assign { slave12_cyc_i, slave12_stb_i } = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave12_selected == 1'b1)} };
00388 assign { slave13_cyc_i, slave13_stb_i } = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave13_selected == 1'b1)} };
00389 assign { slave14_cyc_i, slave14_stb_i } = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave14_selected == 1'b1)} };
00390 assign { slave15_cyc_i, slave15_stb_i } = { 2{(master_cyc_stb_o == 1'b1) && (slave15_selected == 1'b1)} };
00391 
00392 assign slave_dat_o =
00393     (slave0_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave0_dat_o :
00394     (slave1_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave1_dat_o :
00395     (slave2_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave2_dat_o :
00396     (slave3_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave3_dat_o :
00397     (slave4_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave4_dat_o :
00398     (slave5_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave5_dat_o :
00399     (slave6_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave6_dat_o :
00400     (slave7_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave7_dat_o :
00401     (slave8_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave8_dat_o :
00402     (slave9_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave9_dat_o :
00403     (slave10_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave10_dat_o :
00404     (slave11_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave11_dat_o :
00405     (slave12_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave12_dat_o :
00406     (slave13_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave13_dat_o :
00407     (slave14_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave14_dat_o :
00408     slave15_dat_o;
00409     
00410 
00411 wire master_ack_i = 
00412     (slave0_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave0_ack_o :
00413     (slave1_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave1_ack_o :
00414     (slave2_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave2_ack_o :
00415     (slave3_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave3_ack_o :
00416     (slave4_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave4_ack_o :
00417     (slave5_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave5_ack_o :
00418     (slave6_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave6_ack_o :
00419     (slave7_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave7_ack_o :
00420     (slave8_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave8_ack_o :
00421     (slave9_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave9_ack_o :
00422     (slave10_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave10_ack_o :
00423     (slave11_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave11_ack_o :
00424     (slave12_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave12_ack_o :
00425     (slave13_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave13_ack_o :
00426     (slave14_selected == 1'b1) ?    slave14_ack_o :
00427                                     slave15_ack_o;
00428 wire master_rty_i = 
00429     (slave0_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave0_rty_o :
00430     (slave1_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave1_rty_o :
00431     (slave2_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave2_rty_o :
00432     (slave3_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave3_rty_o :
00433     (slave4_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave4_rty_o :
00434     (slave5_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave5_rty_o :
00435     (slave6_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave6_rty_o :
00436     (slave7_selected == 1'b1) ?     slave7_rty_o :
